item.description: Folks this event is launching the Boston area of FDI Youngevity! Folks this is an ALL-STAR event! Million Dollar earners abound! VP of Training Steve Schulz, VP of Leadership Development Mike Randolph, #1 Rep of FDIY Sheryl Morley , PMD Maxandra DesRosiers, VPMD Annie Trajlinek and VPMD Bernadette Trafton will ROCK THE HOUSE! BOSTON will not know what hit them! Self-motivated, positve, high-powered people to network with! An opportunity presentation followed by the BEST training the industry has to offer! BE AT THIS EVENT!!! I haven't seen this much star power in a room since the National Convention!! Contact Bernadette at 603-505-8683, dette101@gmail.com for free entrance! Refreshments will be provided. ACT NOW, There is limited seating at this event RSVP today!

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: SAVE MONEY! GET HEALTHY! CREATE WEALTH! - Must RSVP TO Guarentee seating
